entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
